solution_line_template: She previously had {strawberries} cartons + {blueberries} cartons = <<{strawberries}+{blueberries}={current_cartons}>>{current_cartons} cartons of berries.
Emilia needs to buy {needed_cartons} cartons - {current_cartons} cartons = <<{needed_cartons}-{current_cartons}={cartons_to_buy}>>{cartons_to_buy} cartons of berries.
